Are you sure you want to delete all collected data?
Click the Share button to send data to the developers
Lumetro is not working as expected (please describe your problem in more detail if you want and if it possible)
Are you sure you want to close the launcher?
You can skip the launcher setup. In this case, the default settings will be applied. By continuing, you agree to Lumetro\'s terms of use
Hello!\nThank you for installing Lumetro.\nWe\'ll now help you set up the launcher
Are you sure you don’t want to pin apps to the start screen?
Pin your favorite apps to the start screen
We were unable to launch this application.
You\'re now ready to get started.
Thank you for trying Lumetro.\nWe hope you\'ll enjoy it!
Let’s customize your theme to make it feel like home

Please note that Lumetro is under active (maybe) development.

This means you may encounter issues (including critical ones) while using the app.
If you find a bug or want to suggest a new feature, please report it on GitHub: https://github.com/queuejw/LumetroLauncher 

You’re free to stop using Lumetro at any time if it doesn’t meet your expectations.

Thank you for your understanding!

If an error occurs while using the app, we automatically save error data and then notify you. Later, you can share this information with us or delete it. We do not send this data automatically. Everything is stored locally on this device. More details will be provided later.
Lumetro is an open-source Android launcher. It contains no paid features and is completely free.\n\nhttps://github.com/queuejw/LumetroLauncher
You can use this app without any restrictions. Below are explanations for some aspects you may encounter while using the launcher.
If you downloaded this app from a third-party source, please install it from official sources instead. Only continue using the app if you trust your source.
As mentioned earlier, we collect some device data to help us fix app issues faster. Below is the information we collect:

All data is stored locally on your device in the app's storage. You can review the collected data at:

Lumetro Settings -> Feedback -> show collected data.

You can either send it to us (to help fix the issue) or delete it.

Note: We do not automatically send your data but collect it locally after each error. You can change this in Lumetro settings. If disabled, we will stop collect any device or app data.

The app may use an internet connection to check for updates.\n\nBy default, this feature is disabled, and we will ask for your permission before checking for updates. No other tasks require an internet connection. Please note: This is not currently working.

THIS APPLICATION IS PROVIDED """AS IS""". THE DEVELOPER DOES NOT GUARANTEE STABLE APP WORK AND SHALL NOT BE HELD LIABLE FOR ANY CONSEQUENCES RESULTING FROM ITS USE.

IF YOU HAVE QUESTIONS, CONTACT US VIA:
TELEGRAM: @lumetro_launcher (https://t.me/lumetro_launcher)
OR EMAIL: dimon6018t@gmail.com

BY CONTINUING TO USE THE APPLICATION, YOU ASSUME FULL RESPONSIBILITY FOR ITS USE.
Thank you for your interest in Lumetro!
You may now close the app

This app, plus any information it contains, will be deleted from your phone
There are no experiments available.\nThey may appear in future updates.
if you press it, everything will break.

You can disable changing tiles using this setting
When you change the icon pack or clear the icon cache, the app may run slower than usual. We need a little time to save the new icons in the cache.
